subprocess_flow.description: Confirm that the stock-out cannot be resolved through immediate actions (back stock, transfers, etc.) and that a replenishment order is necessary.
success_criteria: Confirmation that a replenishment order is required.

subprocess_flow.description: If the stocked-out item is a frequently stocked-out item, select the pre-approved order template for that item.
success_criteria: Appropriate order template has been selected (if available).

subprocess_flow.description: Determine the order quantity based on demand forecasts, lead times, safety stock levels, and the identified root cause of the stock-out. Adjust the quantity from the template if needed.
success_criteria: Order quantity is accurately calculated based on relevant factors.

subprocess_flow.description: Complete the replenishment order form (either manual or electronic) with all necessary information, including product ID, order quantity, and delivery instructions.
success_criteria: Replenishment order form is complete and accurate.

subprocess_flow.description: Provide sufficient justification for the urgency of the order, referencing the stock-out situation and potential impact on sales and customer satisfaction.
success_criteria: Clear and compelling justification for order urgency is provided.

subprocess_flow.description: Submit the completed replenishment order to the Purchasing Department.
success_criteria: Replenishment order has been successfully submitted to the Purchasing Department.

subprocess_flow.description: The Purchasing Department confirms receipt of the replenishment order.
success_criteria: Purchasing Department has confirmed receipt of the replenishment order.
